content: I have finally managed to make #26446 compile. This PR makes morphisms in induced and full subcategories a 1-field structure. Overall, automation works better. As this is a massive refactor (150 modified files), please do not hesitate looking only at a few files...
This is great, thank you so much!
I just assigned myself, I'll have time to review the whole thing tomorrow (but others should of course not hesitate to give (partial) reviews before then).
Thanks very much @Dagur Asgeirsson for the review!
Thanks a lot for doing this! I have been wanting this for ages but couldn’t find the courage to actually implement the refactor.
